topics.body: Yeah. Shichika's sister is too godlike. It may be a bit silly of me, but I hate HATE *HATE* when a writer blatantly god-mods a character. Especially if it's a villain. Because that means the only way the hero can beat them is by the most blatant of ass-pulls.

topics.body: It's terrible having a dad who is a clear homophobe, or doesn't understand that using gay terms as insults isn't okay, and is also old, ignorant, and stubborn
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5511a9ef63687279266c0700#post_5511a9ef63687279266c0700
Was he being mean to you?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5511a9ef63687279266c0700#post_5511a9ef63687279266c0700
My grandpa {who raised me like a father} told me if I was gay he'd disown me and wouldn't come to my wedding...
Of course he told me that back when I had a girlfriend and was working up the courage to tell him.
Needless to say my grandma's the only one who knew and she made my life a living hell because of it.
